author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

**Backport** of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40444
In case TSG would need to use 12_6_X for 2023 MC studies with HCAL high-DC and corresponding (high-level) ZS conditions specially prepared for these studies.
title: [12_6_X] HCAL: make HBHE zero suppression simulation identical to the data-taking one for Run3
